title: @ new chicken camp
body:
holy fk those lil bastards hurt if you're not paying attention early mid game and are trying to just take them really quick, especially if you're behind. mind you this is in regards to non-junglers taking the jungle camp for some extra gold while your jungler is preoccupied.

i walked up thinking "ah, i'll just tank a little damage, i don't feel like attack moving, because it won't matter"

it does matter.

this has been a PSA from a friendly, yet kinda dumb elephant
